landing.heroTitle: AI-powered visa partner for students and travelers
landing.heroSubtitle: Get personalized document checklists, step-by-step guidance, and 24/7 AI support. Everything you need for your visa application, synced across mobile and web.
landing.howItWorksSubtitle: Four simple steps to your visa application
landing.step1Desc: Answer a few questions about your travel plans, destination, and visa type.
landing.step2Desc: AI generates a custom document checklist based on your profile and destination.
landing.step3Desc: Upload your documents securely. Our AI validates them and provides feedback.
landing.step4Desc: Get instant answers to questions about requirements, deadlines, and next steps.
landing.featuresSubtitle: All the tools you need for a successful visa application
landing.feature1Desc: AI-generated document checklist tailored to your profile, destination, and visa type.
landing.feature2Desc: Clear guidance on where and how to obtain each required document.
landing.feature3Desc: AI-powered validation ensures your documents meet embassy requirements before submission.
landing.feature4Desc: 24/7 AI assistant answers questions about requirements, deadlines, and processes.
landing.countriesSubtitle: We support visa applications for these popular destinations
landing.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about Ketdik
landing.faq1Answer: Yes, Ketdik uses bank-level encryption to protect your data. We never store your passport or sensitive documents in plain text, and all data is synced securely between your mobile app and web dashboard.
landing.faq2Answer: No, Ketdik is a preparation and guidance tool. We help you gather documents, understand requirements, and prepare your application. You submit directly to the embassy or consulate.
landing.faq3Answer: Ketdik offers free document checklists and AI chat support. Premium features may include priority support and advanced document validation. Check our pricing page for details.
landing.faq4Question: Can I use Ketdik on mobile and web?
landing.faq4Answer: Yes! Your data syncs automatically between the Ketdik mobile app and web dashboard. Start on one device and continue on another seamlessly.

progress.tip: Progress increases when AI verifies your documents. Pending documents count as partial progress.

welcome.title: Welcome to Ketdik!
welcome.description: Your AI-powered visa application assistant. Let us guide you through the process.

startApplication.title: Start Your First Application
startApplication.description: Answer a few questions about your trip, and we will generate a personalized document checklist.

uploadDocuments.title: Upload & Verify Documents
uploadDocuments.description: Upload your documents and our AI will verify them instantly. Get real-time feedback and guidance.

templates.title: Document Templates

templates.employmentLetterDesc: Template for employment verification letter from your employer

templates.travelItineraryDesc: Template for detailed travel itinerary with dates and locations
